content.rendered:
Directed by Aaron Horvath. Michael Jelenic. Pierre Leduc.

Written by Matthew Fogel.

Cast Chris Pratt .Anya Taylor-Joy .Charlie Day

Language English.

Producer Christelle Balcon. Yusuke Beppu. Brett Hoffman. Kelly Lake. Christopher Meledandri. Shigeru Miyamoto. Bill Ryan. Robert Taylor.

Production Universal Pictures. Nintendo. Illumination Entertainment.
